section.title: Initialization and Reinitialization
section.para:
Opcodes used for the initialization of variables:
init
tival
=
passign
pset

The opcodes that can generate another initialization pass are:
reinit
rigoto
rireturn
The opcode p can be used to find score p-fields at i- or k-rate.
nstrnum returns the instrument number for a named instrument.

para.note:
Note that a instrument may modify the p3 (duration) parameter at initialisation time. For example statements like
iattack = 0.02 irelease = 0.04 isustain = p3 p3 = iattack + isustain + irelease
are valid.
